src:
Fakhri Husaini Soroti Penyelesaian Akhir Timnas U-19
06 Nov 2019, 23:38 by Irsyan Hasyim (Kontributor), Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Pelatih Timnas U-19 Indonesia, Fakhri Husaini, menyoroti penyelesaian akhir para pemainnya. Secara khusus ia mengkritik Beckham Puta Nugraha yang gagal mengkonversi beberapa peluang menjadi gol dalam laga melawan Timot Leste di Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020.
Menurut dia, dalam sesi latihan dan uji coba Beckham memiliki akurasi tendangan yang bagus. "Tapi malam ini saya nggak tahu kenapa dia buang banyak peluang," kata dia usai laga melawan Timor Leste di Stadion Madya, Jakarta, Rabu, 6 September 2019.
Juru taktik berusia 54 tahun mengatakan untuk pemain yang masih berumur 18 tahun memang sulit untuk bisa keluar dari tekanan. "Tekanan lawan mungkin bisa mereka atasi, tapi mungkin ada aspek-aspek lain yang menurut saya perlu ada treatment tersendiri," ungkap Fakhri.
Menurut dia, sebagai pelatih bakal mengevaluasi performa Beckham yang di bawah standar. Ia menduga kontrol bola yang terburu-buru diakibatkan dari faktor mental yang kurang tenang dan kurang percaya diri. "Ini menjadi catatan kami ya soal finishing tadi," kata dia.
Timnas U-19 mengalahkan Timor Leste U-19 dengan skor 3-1 dalam laga pertama babak Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 Grup K di Stadion Madya, Gelora Bung Karno, Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Timnas U-19 mencetak gol cepat lewat Muhammad Fajar Fathur pada menit ke-2. Gol ini berawal dari tendangan sudut Beckham Putra yang diselesaikan dengan baik oleh Fajar lewat sundulan kepala.
Timor Leste U-19 berhasil menyamakan kedudukan lewat gol Mouzinho De Lima yang sukses menjadi algojo tendangan penalti pada menit ke-51. Pada menit ke-59, pemain Timor Leste, Nelson Pinto diganjar kartu merah oleh wasit karena melakukan pelanggaran kepada Bagus Kahfi. Nelson melakukan tendangan dengan mengangkat kaki hingga mengenai muka Bagus.
Keunggulan jumlah pemain tak disia-siakan pemain Timnas U-19. Mereka terus melancarkan serangan ke pertahanan Timor Leste. Pada menit ke-62, kapten Timnas U-19, David Maulana mencetak gol kedua bagi Indonesia. Umpan dari Fajar Fathur diselesaikan dengan tendangan keras dari luar kotak penalti.
Pada menit ke-77, Fajar menambah keunggulan bagi Indonesia. Ia sukses menyelesaikan umpan silang dari Supriadi, pemain yang masuk menggantikan Sutan Diego Armando Zico pada menit ke-53.

IRSYAN HASYIM
text:
Fakhri Husaini Highlights Final Completion of U-19 National Team
Nov 6, 2019, 23:38 by Irsyan Hasyim (Contributor), Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian U-19 national team coach Fakhri Husaini highlighted the final completion of the players. In particular he criticized Beckham Puta Nugraha for failing to convert several chances into goals in a match against Timot Leste in the AFC U-19 2020 Qualifying Cup.
According to him, in training sessions and trials Beckham has good kick accuracy. "But tonight I don't know why he wasted so many opportunities," he said after the match against Timor Leste at Madya Stadium, Jakarta, Wednesday, September 6, 2019.
The 54-year-old tactician said that for players who are 18 years old it is indeed difficult to get out of pressure. "The pressure of their opponents may be overcome, but there may be other aspects that in my opinion need to be treated separately," said Fakhri.
According to him, as a coach will evaluate Beckham's sub-standard performance. He suspects the rush of ball control results from mental factors that are less calm and lack of confidence. "This is our record about finishing earlier," he said.
U-19 national team defeated East Timor U-19 with a score of 3-1 in the first match of the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup Group K at Madya Stadium, Gelora Bung Karno, Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
U-19 national team scored a quick goal through Muhammad Fajar Fathur in the 2nd minute. This goal started from Beckham Son's corner kick that was completed well by Fajar through a header.
Timor Leste U-19s managed to equalize through Mouzinho De Lima's goal which was a penalty executioner in the 51st minute. In the 59th minute, East Timorese Nelson Pinto was rewarded by a referee for a foul on Bagus Kahfi. Nelson takes the kick by raising his foot to hit Bagus's face.
The superiority of the number of players is not wasted U-19 national team players. They continued to carry out attacks on the defense of East Timor. In the 62nd minute, the U-19 national team captain, David Maulana scored the second goal for Indonesia. Bait from Fajar Fathur completed with a hard kick from outside the penalty box.
In the 77th minute, Fajar added excellence to Indonesia. He successfully completed a cross from Supriadi, the player who came on for Sutan Diego Armando Zico in the 53rd minute.

IRSYAN HASYIM
